Copyright {#page-title .page__title .title}

With the exception of the Commonwealth Coat of Arms and where otherwise noted, all material presented on this site is provided under the latest Creative Commons Attribution licence.

The details of the relevant licence conditions and the full legal code for the licence are available on the Creative Commons website.

Use of the Coat of Arms

The terms under which the Coat of Arms can be used are detailed on the It’s an Honour website.

Attribution

The DTO acknowledges the UK Government Digital Service for the materials that have been adapted from the UK Government Service Design Manual. Anyone using this material should note that it includes public sector information licenced under the UK Open Government Licence v2.0.
